drupalNodeEvent.title: From Click to Boom: The Political Economy of E-commerce in China

field_organizers.processed: MIT Sloan School of Management/MIT School of Architecture and Planning

field_description.processed: The MIT China seminar is co-organized by Professor Yasheng Huang of the Sloan School and Professor Siqi Zheng of the School of Architecture and Planning. It is a periodical gathering of scholars from a variety of disciplines interested in (mainly contemporary) China research. The seminar is made possible by the support of Mr. Xianhong Wu and the MIT Sustainable Urbanization Lab.
